translation.text: https://transportnsw.info/alerts#/train
Station Update - Sydenham

Platforms 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works. A new Metro concourse is being constructed on the northern end of Sydenham Station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please ask staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
https://transportnsw.info/alerts#/train
Station Update - Central

There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Access to certain areas of the station and platforms may mean using different stairs, escalators and lifts. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff. For detailed information please visit https://transportnsw.info/alerts/details#/6049959
https://www.transportnsw.info/alerts#/6050456
Hawkesbury Rd bus stop closures and diversions

From 8pm Friday 5 June, Hawkesbury Rd, Westmead will be one-way in a southbound direction between Darcy Rd and Hainsworth St. The following stops will be permanently closed:

∙ The Westmead Institute Hawkesbury Rd (214516)
∙ Westmead Hospital Hawkesbury Rd (214517)

The alternative stops are Westmead Children's Hospital Hawkesbury Rd (214515) or Darcy Rd after Hawkesbury Rd (214518).

From 8pm Friday 5 June, Hawkesbury Rd, Westmead will be one-way in a southbound direction between Darcy Rd and Hainsworth St. The following stops will be permanently closed:
  • The Westmead Institute Hawkesbury Rd (214516)
  • Westmead Hospital Hawkesbury Rd (214517)
The alternative stops are Westmead Children’s Hospital Hawkesbury Rd (214515) or Darcy Rd after Hawkesbury Rd (214518).
https://www.transportnsw.info/alerts#/6054145
The Crescent, Annandale temporary bus stop closure

The westbound bus stop on The Crescent at Johnston St (203816) will be temporarily closed from Monday 16 November 2020 until Wednesday 30 June 2021 for WestConnex Rozelle Interchange works.

Route 433 services towards Balmain Gladstone Park and Major Event Bus route 2 towards Sydney Olympic Park will use the stop on The Crescent at View St (203815) instead.

Check signs for directions to the alternative stop location.

The westbound bus stop on The Crescent at Johnston St (203816) will be temporarily closed from Monday 16 November 2020 until Wednesday 30 June 2021 for WestConnex Rozelle Interchange works.

Route 433 services towards Balmain Gladstone Park and Major Event Bus route 2 towards Sydney Olympic Park will use the stop on The Crescent at View St (203815) instead.

Check signs for directions to the alternative stop location.
https://www.transportnsw.info/alerts#/6050007
Padstow Heights temporary stop closure

From Wednesday 27 May 2020 to Saturday 17 July 2021, from 7am to 6pm Monday to Friday and 7am to 1pm on Saturdays, the bus stop Walter Skelton Village, Hall Cres St, Padstow Heights (221136) will be closed due to construction works. Route M91 bus services will run from a temporary bus stop on Dilke Road.

From Wednesday 27 May 2020 to Saturday 17 July 2021, from 7am to 6pm Monday to Friday and 7am to 1pm on Saturdays, the bus stop Walter Skelton Village, Hall Cres St, Padstow Heights (221136) will be closed due to construction works. Route M91 bus services will run from a temporary bus stop on Dilke Road.
https://www.transportnsw.info/alerts#/6051796
Roseville Station Commuter Car Park temporary closure
From Monday 3 August 2020 the Roseville Station Commuter Car Park will be closed for approximately 16 months while station upgrades take place.
From Monday 3 August 2020 the Roseville Station Commuter Car Park will be closed for approximately 16 months while station upgrades take place.

Victoria Rd, Rozelle bus stop relocation
From Saturday 29 February, the city-bound bus stop on Victoria Rd opposite Hornsey St (203916) will be relocated to just after Loughlin St until the completion of the Rozelle Interchange in 2023.
From Saturday 29 February, the city-bound bus stop on Victoria Rd opposite Hornsey St (203916) will be relocated to just after Loughlin St until the completion of the Rozelle Interchange in 2023.

Yamba bus diversions

From 6am Monday 11 January 2021 to 5pm Thursday 15 July 2021, route 380 buses will divert and miss two stops while road works take place. 

Closed stops

∙ Shores Dr opp Park Ave (246440)
∙ Shores Dr at Park Ave (246435)

Closed stops

Crows Nest, temporary bus stop closure

From 4am Monday 11 January 2021 to the end of August 2023, Sydney Metro works will see bus stop Pacific Hwy after Oxley St (206515) close. 

The alternative stop will be Pacific Hwy after Albany St (206514) affecting routes 114, 144, 252, 254, 257, 265, 286, 287, 290, 291 and 320 heading towards the North Sydney, McMahons Point, the Northern Beaches, the city and Mascot.

From 4am Monday 11 January 2021 to the end of August 2023, Sydney Metro works will see bus stop Pacific Hwy after Oxley St (206515) close.

The alternative stop will be Pacific Hwy after Albany St (206514) affecting routes 114, 144, 252, 254, 257, 265, 286, 287, 290, 291 and 320 heading towards the North Sydney, McMahons Point, the Northern Beaches, the city and Mascot.
https://transportnsw.info/alerts#/train
Station Update - Redfern
Due to station redevelopment work some platforms have reduced capacity. Please avoid standing in front of construction zones and remain behind the yellow line on the platform
https://transportnsw.info/alerts#/train
Station Update - Central

From 11 January to end-December 2021, the escalators and staircase connecting the corner of Pitt Street and Eddy Avenue with the Grand Concourse and L1 Light Rail stop will be closed due to station upgrade works. 

To access the Grand Concourse and Platforms 1 to 12 from the street level, please use the Western Forecourt entry via Pitt Street. To access Platforms 16 to 25 from the street level, please use the Eddy Avenue entry. 

To access Pitt Street or Eddy Avenue from the Grand Concourse or L1 light rail stop, please exit the station via the Western Forecourt or Northern Concourse.
https://www.transportnsw.info/alerts#/6057811
Kissing Point Rd, Dundas bus stop relocation

The bus stop relocation in Dundas will now be extended to the end of July 2021 as part of Parramatta Light Rail construction work.

The bus stop Vineyard Creek Reserve, Kissing Point Rd (211767) will be temporarily closed and relocated 180 metres east of its current location.

You can also use the alternate stop Fred Robertson Park, Kissing Point Rd (211722)

The bus stop relocation in Dundas will now be extended to the end of July 2021 as part of Parramatta Light Rail construction work.

The bus stop Vineyard Creek Reserve, Kissing Point Rd (211767) will be temporarily closed and relocated 180 metres east of its current location.

You can also use the alternate stop Fred Robertson Park, Kissing Point Rd (211722)

Barangaroo temporary wharf closure

From Monday 15 February until the end of March 2021, Barangaroo Wharf 2 will be closed due to an Opal gate upgrade. 

During this time, all ferry services will arrive and depart from Wharf 1.

From Monday 15 February until the end of March 2021, Barangaroo Wharf 2 will be closed due to an Opal gate upgrade.

During this time, all ferry services will arrive and depart from Wharf 1.

Roadworks Brown Mountain

As a result of planned roadworks at Brown Mountain between 19 April and 11 June 2021, NSW TrainLink coach service Canberra Hospital to Eden will run 25 minutes earlier than the normal scheduled times.

Due to planned track work, this service will be departing 15 minutes earlier then normal scheduled times from Griffith and all stations to Junee.
Junee through to Sydney will run as per normal scheduled time.

Track work between Griffith and Junee

Due to planned track work, this service will be delayed at Junee for 15 minutes and will be running 15 minutes later than normal scheduled times between Junee and Griffith.

Sydney through Junee will run as per normal scheduled timetable.

Sydney Olympic Park diversions for Sydney Royal Easter Show

From Tuesday 16 March until Monday 19 April route 525 services to and from Sydney Olympic Park will be diverting and using different stops while roads are closed for the Sydney Royal Easter Show (1 to 12 April). 

Stops on Dawn Fraser Ave will be missed in both directions. Use alternative stops on Park St at Olympic Park Station instead. Check signs at bus stops and allow extra travel time. 

For more information visit the Sydney Royal Easter Show event page. 

Closed stops:

∙ Dawn Fraser Ave near Edwin Flack Ave (212788)
∙ Dawn Fraser Ave After Edwin flack Ave (212787)
∙ Park St opp Olympic Park Station (212790)

No stops will be missed.

For more information on travel to the Show visit the Sydney Royal Easter Show event page.

Trackwork between Strathfield and Central

Saturday 10 and Sunday 11 April

∙ Trains run between Blue Mountains Line stations and Strathfield only.
∙ Change at Strathfield for a T1 Western, T2 Inner West or T9 Northern Line train to the City.
∙ Bathurst trains run between Bathurst and Central, some to a changed timetable.
∙ From 11pm Saturday until 5am Sunday, buses replace all trains between Strathfield and Central.
∙ Plan your trip before you travel for up-to-date information.

Saturday 10 and Sunday 11 April

  • Trains run between Blue Mountains Line stations and Strathfield only.
  • Change at Strathfield for a T1 Western, T2 Inner West or T9 Northern Line train to the City.
  • Bathurst trains run between Bathurst and Central, some to a changed timetable.
  • From 11pm Saturday until 5am Sunday, buses replace all trains between Strathfield and Central.
  • Plan your trip before you travel for up-to-date information.
https://www.transportnsw.info/alerts#/6059239
Trackwork may affect your travel

Tuesday 6 to Thursday 8 April

∙ Nightly from 10.40pm until 2.30am, some trains run to a changed timetable via the T1 North Shore Line, making extra stops at Chatswood, Wynyard and Town Hall.
∙ Buses replace trains on the T9 Northern Line.
∙ Limited stop buses run from Strathfield to Hornsby to connect with Central Coast & Newcastle Line trains at Hornsby.
∙ On Thursday and Friday, the 01:47 Central to Newcastle Interchange service will run via Strathfield, to a changed timetable.
∙ Plan your trip before you travel for up-to-date information.

Bus route
1T9: Strathfield, North Strathfield, Concord West, then Eastwood, Epping, then express to Hornsby and return (Tuesday)
86T9: Strathfield, then Eastwood, Epping, Hornsby and return (Wednesday and Thursday)

  • Plan your trip before you travel for up-to-date information.

Trackwork may affect your travel

Saturday 10 and Sunday 11 April


∙ Trains run to a changed timetable between Central Coast & Newcastle Line stations and Central via the T1 North Shore Line. 
∙ Trains make extra stops at Gordon, Chatswood, then all stations to Central. Each day from 9am most trains continue to Olympic Park. 
∙ If you are travelling from Strathfield or Epping to Central Coast & Newcastle Line stations catch a T9 Northern Line train to Hornsby then change for a Central Coast & Newcastle Line train. 
∙ Plan your trip before you travel for up-to-date information.

Saturday 10 and Sunday 11 April

  • Trains run to a changed timetable between Central Coast & Newcastle Line stations and Central via the T1 North Shore Line. 
  • Trains make extra stops at Gordon, Chatswood, then all stations to Central. Each day from 9am most trains continue to Olympic Park. 
  • If you are travelling from Strathfield or Epping to Central Coast & Newcastle Line stations catch a T9 Northern Line train to Hornsby then change for a Central Coast & Newcastle Line train. 
  • Plan your trip before you travel for up-to-date information.
https://www.transportnsw.info/alerts#/6059241

Trackwork between Wollongong and Sutherland, and between Central and Bondi Junction

Friday 2 to Monday 5 April

∙ Buses replace trains between Wollongong and Sutherland, and between Central and Bondi Junction.
∙ Trains run to a changed timetable between Port Kembla, Kiama and Wollongong.
∙ T4 Illawarra Line trains run to a changed timetable between Sutherland and North Sydney or the City Circle.
∙ Plan your trip before you travel for up-to-date information.

90SC Wollongong, North Wollongong, then express to Sutherland and return
91SC Wollongong, all stations to Thirroul, then express to Heathcote, Engadine, Loftus, Sutherland and return
92SC Wollongong, then all stations to Stanwell Park, Helensburgh Town Centre, Waterfall then all stations to 
 Sutherland and return

Trackwork may affect your travel

Tuesday 6 to Thursday 8 April

∙ Nightly from 10.40pm until 1am, no trackwork scheduled on the metro, but trackwork on the T9 Northern Line may affect how you travel.
∙ If you are travelling to the City please change at Chatswood, not Epping, for a direct train via the T1 North Shore Line.
∙ Central Coast & Newcastle Line services also run via the T1 North Shore Line, making an extra stop at Chatswood.
∙ Plan your trip before you travel for up-to-date information.

  • Central Coast & Newcastle Line services also run via the T1 North Shore Line, making an extra stop at Chatswood.

Lift Availability - Sydenham
The lift between the concourse and platform 4/5 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9563 7764.

Station Update - Marayong

There is currently minimal lighting available at Marayong Station due to a power supply issue. Station lifts, Station information screens and Opal facilities may not be available as a result. Customers are advised to request a fare adjustment at transportnsw.info/opal. 

Please take extra care when attending stations and boarding/alighting from trains.
